title: Chuusotsu Tansakusha No Nariagari Eiyuutan
alternative_title: 中卒探索者の成り上がり英雄譚～2つの最強スキルでダンジョン最速突破を目指す～ ; Chusotsu Tansaku Sha No Nariagari Eiyu Tan 2 Tsu No Saikyo Skill De Dan John Saisoku Toppa Wo Mezasu
status: 中卒探索者の成り上がり英雄譚～2つの最強スキルでダンジョン最速突破を目指す～ ; Chusotsu Tansaku Sha No Nariagari Eiyu Tan 2 Tsu No Saikyo Skill De Dan John Saisoku Toppa Wo Mezasu
description:
Description :
        Modern Japan where dungeons occur. Hayato Amahara, a 16-year-old junior high school graduate, is a poor explorer who sips the slime he has hunted and lives in a ragged house in the accident property. However, when he met a mysterious beauty, Hexa, his life turned around! It was a “weapon creation” that can create weapons! Unique beautiful girls gather around him!?
